dca.title: Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA)
dca.description: Smart capital distribution across multiple price levels
dca.howItWorks: DCA strategy automatically places buy orders at predetermined price levels below the current market price. This approach reduces the average entry price and minimizes timing risk.

grid.title: Grid Trading
grid.description: Profit from market volatility with automated buy/sell grids
grid.howItWorks: Grid trading places multiple buy and sell orders at regular intervals above and below the current price, creating a 'grid' of orders. Profits are generated from each price fluctuation within the range.

scalping.title: Scalping
scalping.description: High-frequency trading for quick profits from small price movements
scalping.howItWorks: Scalping executes multiple trades throughout the day, targeting small price movements. The strategy uses tight stop-losses and quick profit targets to accumulate gains.

trend.title: Trend Following
trend.description: Ride long-term market trends with momentum indicators
trend.howItWorks: Trend following identifies and follows sustained market movements using technical indicators like EMA, MACD, and RSI. Positions are held longer to capture significant price movements.

ai_ensemble.title: AI Ensemble Strategy
ai_ensemble.description: Advanced machine learning combining multiple AI models
ai_ensemble.howItWorks: Our proprietary AI ensemble combines LSTM neural networks, transformer models, and traditional technical analysis to generate high-probability trade signals with real-time market adaptation.
